00075 uint16_t crc_ccitt(uint16_t crc, const void *buffer, size_t len)
00076 {
00077     const unsigned char *buf = (const unsigned char *)buffer;
00078     while (len--)
00079         crc = updcrc_ccitt(*buf++, crc);
00080 
00081     return crc;
00082 }
